attributes.action: War hero, Tom Moore to be given the highest honour for his fund raising.
attributes.additional_details:
Tom Moore is a remarkable man at 99yrs old he has managed to raise in excess of £5 million for the NHS.
Already this man has shown his commitment to this country but has done it again again.
At a time when we need inspiration this man has shown it in his good deed.
attributes.background: Bestow this countries highest honour to War hero, Tom Moore 99, who has raised over £5m for NHS by walking 100 lengths of his garden, and the figure continues, to rise.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
